metadata.name: Arcalyst 160 mg 2mL Injection powder lyophilized for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in fungal infections bacterial infection skin infections disorders and onychomycosis

incompatibilities.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Amphotericin B can be decreased when used in combination with Abafungin
Didanosine can cause a decrease in the absorption of Abafungin resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
The serum concentration of Sildenafil can be increased when it is combined with Abafungin
Sucralfate can cause a decrease in the absorption of Abafungin resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
The risk or severity of myopathy can be increased when Abafungin is combined with Atorvastatin
The therapeutic efficacy of Abafungin can be increased when used in combination with Isradipine
The therapeutic efficacy of Abafungin can be increased when used in combination with Diltiazem
The therapeutic efficacy of Abafungin can be increased when used in combination with Trimethadione
